name: ACC F2R Cement
description:
ACC Gold Cement

Product Name: ACC Gold Cement (often marketed as ACC Gold Water Shield)

Manufacturer: ACC Limited (part of the Adani Group)

Cement Type: Premium blended cement with water-repellent properties

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: ISI-certified quality cement for construction use

Positioning: Premium value-added cement designed for enhanced durability and moisture resistance

Key Features

  • Water-Repellent Technology: Engineered with inherent water resistance to significantly reduce capillary water absorption and seepage in concrete.
  • High Strength Performance: Offers superior compressive strength suitable for critical structural elements.
  • Reduced Permeability: Denser concrete with lower porosity, minimizing ingress of water, chloride, and sulfate ions.
  • Smooth Workability: Fine and uniform particle size enhances ease of mixing, placement, and finish quality.
  • Durability: Improved resistance to environmental stresses, contributing to long-lasting structures.

Benefits

  • Enhanced Durability: Reduces risk of seepage, dampness, and long-term deterioration in concrete structures.
  • Better Structural Integrity: High strength and lower permeability help maintain load-bearing performance over time.
  • Cost-Effective Building: Fewer maintenance and repair needs due to moisture-resistant properties.
  • Aesthetic Finish: Smooth and uniform mortar resulting in improved surface finish in plaster and masonry.
  • Versatile Environmental Performance: Suitable for a variety of climate conditions, including monsoon and coastal environments due to improved resistance to moisture and chemical attack.

Applications

ACC Gold Cement is suitable for a wide range of construction tasks, including but not limited to:

  • Foundations, Beams & Columns: Core structural elements requiring strong, durable concrete.
  • Brick Masonry & Plaster Work: Interior and exterior wall plastering for improved finish and reduced dampness.
  • Slabs and Roof Concrete: Horizontal surfaces where water resistance and strength matter.
  • Bathrooms, Balconies & Terraces: Areas prone to water exposure where seepage resistance is critical.
  • Water Retaining Structures: Water tanks, canals, and foundations in high humidity zones benefiting from reduced permeability.

name: UltraTech Super Cement
description:
UltraTech Super Cement

Product Name: UltraTech Super Cement

Manufacturer: UltraTech Cement Limited (Aditya Birla Group)

Cement Type: Premium Portland Pozzolana Cement (PPC) with enhanced performance

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Conforms to IS 1489-1:1991 specifications

Positioning: India's leading cement brand for superior strength and durability

Key Features

  • High Early Strength: Rapid strength development allows faster construction cycles and early load application.
  • Superior Durability: Enhanced resistance to chemical attacks from sulfates and chlorides.
  • Low Heat of Hydration: Reduced thermal cracking makes it ideal for mass concreting applications.
  • Better Workability: Improved flow characteristics for easier placement and compaction.
  • Eco-Friendly: Lower carbon footprint with optimized clinker factor and fly ash usage.

Benefits

  • Faster Construction: High early strength enables quick formwork removal and reduced project timelines.
  • Long-Term Performance: Excellent resistance to aggressive environments ensures structural longevity.
  • Cost Efficiency: Better strength-to-cement ratio reduces overall cement consumption.
  • Crack Resistance: Low heat generation minimizes thermal stress in large concrete pours.
  • Sustainable Choice: Reduced CO2 emissions contribute to green building initiatives.

Applications

UltraTech Super Cement is ideal for diverse construction requirements:

  • High-Rise Buildings: Multi-story residential and commercial structures requiring high strength concrete.
  • Bridges & Flyovers: Infrastructure projects demanding superior durability and load-bearing capacity.
  • Marine Structures: Ports, jetties, and coastal constructions exposed to saline environments.
  • Mass Concreting: Dams, raft foundations, and thick concrete sections benefiting from low heat properties.
  • Precast Components: Manufacturing of concrete blocks, pipes, and prefabricated elements.

name: Ambuja Plus Roof Special Cement
description:
Ambuja Plus Roof Special Cement

Product Name: Ambuja Plus Roof Special Cement

Manufacturer: Ambuja Cements Limited (Adani Group)

Cement Type: Specialized Portland Slag Cement (PSC) for roofing applications

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Meets IS 455:1989 standards for Portland Slag Cement

Positioning: Premium cement specifically formulated for roof concreting with enhanced crack resistance

Key Features

  • Superior Crack Resistance: Specially designed low-shrinkage formula minimizes thermal and drying cracks in roof slabs.
  • Heat Reflection Properties: Lighter color reduces heat absorption, keeping interiors cooler.
  • High Flexural Strength: Better performance under bending stresses typical in roof structures.
  • Improved Cohesion: Enhanced particle distribution prevents segregation during placement.
  • Weather Resistance: Excellent performance against harsh sun, rain, and temperature variations.

Benefits

  • Crack-Free Roofs: Reduced shrinkage ensures smooth, durable roof surfaces without unsightly cracks.
  • Thermal Comfort: Heat-reflective properties contribute to lower indoor temperatures and energy savings.
  • Long Service Life: Superior weather resistance extends roof durability with minimal maintenance.
  • Better Finish Quality: Smooth texture enables excellent surface finishing and easy application of waterproofing.
  • Leak Prevention: Dense microstructure prevents water seepage and dampness issues.

Applications

Ambuja Plus Roof Special Cement is specifically designed for:

  • Roof Slabs & Terraces: Primary application for residential and commercial building roofs.
  • Sunshades & Chajjas: Cantilevered elements requiring crack-free performance.
  • Balcony Slabs: Exposed horizontal surfaces subjected to weather elements.
  • Roof Screeding: Top finishing layer for waterproofing preparation.
  • Parapet Walls: Boundary walls on roofs exposed to direct sunlight and rain.

name: Shree Ultra Cement
description:
Shree Ultra Cement

Product Name: Shree Ultra Cement

Manufacturer: Shree Cement Limited

Cement Type: High-performance Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC) 53 Grade

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Complies with IS 12269:2013 specifications for 53 Grade OPC

Positioning: Premium high-strength cement for critical structural applications

Key Features

  • Exceptional Compressive Strength: Achieves 53 MPa at 28 days, suitable for high-load bearing structures.
  • Rapid Strength Gain: Early strength development enables faster construction progress.
  • Fine Grinding: Superior particle fineness ensures better hydration and strength development.
  • Consistent Quality: Stringent quality control maintains uniform performance across batches.
  • Versatile Application: Suitable for both pre-stressed and reinforced concrete work.

Benefits

  • Superior Structural Strength: High compressive strength ideal for load-critical construction elements.
  • Accelerated Project Timelines: Early strength allows faster formwork removal and construction speed.
  • Excellent Finish: Fine particles produce smooth, dense concrete with superior surface quality.
  • Reduced Cement Consumption: Higher strength efficiency translates to material savings.
  • All-Weather Performance: Reliable setting and hardening across various climatic conditions.

Applications

Shree Ultra Cement is engineered for demanding construction requirements:

  • RCC Structures: Beams, columns, and slabs in reinforced concrete construction.
  • Prestressed Concrete: Pre-tensioned and post-tensioned structural elements.
  • High-Rise Construction: Multi-story buildings requiring superior load-bearing capacity.
  • Industrial Structures: Factories, warehouses, and heavy-duty flooring applications.
  • Rapid Construction Projects: Fast-track developments benefiting from quick strength gain.

name: JK Lakshmi Pro Plus Cement
description:
JK Lakshmi Pro Plus Cement

Product Name: JK Lakshmi Pro Plus Cement

Manufacturer: JK Lakshmi Cement Limited

Cement Type: Premium Composite Cement with enhanced performance additives

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Conforms to IS 1489 Part-1 (PPC) specifications

Positioning: Advanced formula cement offering superior strength and workability for modern construction

Key Features

  • Enhanced Setting Control: Optimized setting time provides better workability window for placement.
  • Superior Bonding: Excellent adhesion with reinforcement and aggregates for monolithic structures.
  • Reduced Efflorescence: Lower alkali content minimizes white deposits on finished surfaces.
  • Improved Plasticity: Better flow properties reduce water requirement and improve concrete density.
  • Sulfate Resistance: Enhanced durability in aggressive soil and water conditions.

Benefits

  • Workability Excellence: Extended working time allows proper placement and finishing without compromising strength.
  • Aesthetic Appearance: Reduced efflorescence ensures clean, professional-looking finishes.
  • Water Economy: Lower water-cement ratio requirements lead to denser, stronger concrete.
  • Durability Assurance: Excellent resistance to chemical attacks ensures long-term structural integrity.
  • Versatile Performance: Suitable for diverse applications from foundations to finishing work.

Applications

JK Lakshmi Pro Plus Cement excels in various construction scenarios:

  • Plastering & Finishing: Interior and exterior wall finishes requiring smooth, crack-free surfaces.
  • Brick & Block Masonry: Mortar work for load-bearing and partition walls.
  • Concrete Structures: General RCC work including foundations, beams, and slabs.
  • Floor Screeding: Level finishing of floors before tile or other floor finish installation.
  • Architectural Features: Decorative elements, cornices, and facade work requiring fine finish.

name: Dalmia Power Plus Cement
description:
Dalmia Power Plus Cement

Product Name: Dalmia Power Plus Cement

Manufacturer: Dalmia Bharat Cement

Cement Type: Premium Blended Cement with enhanced durability features

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Meets IS 1489 specifications with enhanced quality parameters

Positioning: Eco-friendly premium cement for sustainable and durable construction

Key Features

  • Low Carbon Footprint: Produced with reduced CO2 emissions supporting green building initiatives.
  • Enhanced Durability: Superior resistance to weathering, chemical attacks, and environmental stress.
  • Optimized Particle Distribution: Better packing density results in stronger, more impermeable concrete.
  • Controlled Fineness: Ideal particle size ensures excellent workability and strength development.
  • Long-Term Strength: Continued strength gain over time for enhanced structural performance.

Benefits

  • Sustainable Construction: Lower environmental impact aligns with green building certifications and standards.
  • Superior Protection: Excellent resistance to chloride and sulfate ingress protects reinforcement.
  • Cost-Effective Durability: Reduced maintenance needs translate to lower lifecycle costs.
  • Consistent Performance: Reliable quality ensures predictable results across all applications.
  • Better Concrete Quality: Dense microstructure improves impermeability and surface finish.

Applications

Dalmia Power Plus Cement is versatile for comprehensive construction needs:

  • Residential Construction: Complete house construction from foundation to roof.
  • Commercial Buildings: Offices, shopping complexes, and institutional structures.
  • Infrastructure Projects: Roads, bridges, culverts, and drainage systems.
  • Industrial Applications: Factory floors, warehouses, and heavy-duty construction.
  • Sustainable Projects: Green buildings and eco-friendly construction initiatives.

name: Birla A1 Premium Cement
description:
Birla A1 Premium Cement

Product Name: Birla A1 Premium Cement

Manufacturer: UltraTech Cement (Aditya Birla Group)

Cement Type: Premium Grade Portland Pozzolana Cement (PPC)

Packaging: 50 kg bags (standard)

Standards: Exceeds IS 1489 Part-1 specifications for PPC

Positioning: Ultra-premium cement for superior finish and long-lasting construction

Key Features

  • Micro-Fine Technology: Ultra-fine particles ensure superior finish quality and enhanced strength.
  • Advanced Water Resistance: Reduced permeability protects against water ingress and dampness.
  • Enhanced Cohesiveness: Better particle bonding results in crack-resistant concrete and mortar.
  • Optimized Setting Time: Balanced setting characteristics for various weather conditions.
  • Premium Quality Assurance: Rigorous testing ensures consistent premium performance.

Benefits

  • Luxurious Finish: Ultra-smooth surface quality ideal for high-end residential and commercial projects.
  • Long-Term Value: Superior durability reduces repair and maintenance costs over structure lifetime.
  • Moisture Protection: Excellent resistance to seepage keeps interiors dry and mold-free.
  • Crack Prevention: Enhanced cohesion minimizes shrinkage cracks in plaster and concrete.
  • Brand Reliability: Trusted quality from one of India's most respected cement manufacturers.

Applications

Birla A1 Premium Cement is perfect for discerning construction requirements:

  • Luxury Homes: High-end residential construction demanding superior finish and durability.
  • Premium Interiors: Interior plastering and finishing for upscale apartments and villas.
  • Commercial Facades: Exterior finishes for corporate buildings and retail spaces.
  • Decorative Elements: Architectural features, moldings, and ornamental work.
  • Moisture-Prone Areas: Bathrooms, kitchens, basements requiring enhanced water resistance.

name: TMT Steel Bars - Fe 500D
description:
TMT Steel Bars - Fe 500D Grade

Product Name: Thermo-Mechanically Treated (TMT) Steel Bars

Manufacturer: SAIL / JSW / Tata Steel

Steel Grade: Fe 500D (High strength ductile steel)

Packaging: Bundle form (6m or 12m length)

Standards: IS 1786:2008 certified for reinforcement steel

Positioning: Premium earthquake-resistant steel for RCC structures

Key Features

  • Superior Ductility: Fe 500D grade offers excellent elongation properties for seismic zone construction.
  • High Tensile Strength: 500 MPa yield strength provides robust load-bearing capacity.
  • Corrosion Resistance: Advanced manufacturing process creates protective oxide layer.
  • Bendability: Superior bending properties without cracking or loss of strength.
  • Weldability: Excellent welding characteristics for construction joints.

Benefits

  • Earthquake Safety: High ductility ensures structures can absorb seismic energy without catastrophic failure.
  • Structural Integrity: Superior strength-to-weight ratio reduces steel consumption.
  • Long Service Life: Better corrosion resistance extends structure lifespan in harsh conditions.
  • Cost Efficiency: Reduced steel quantity requirements due to higher strength.
  • Quality Assurance: ISI marked bars ensure consistent quality and performance.

Applications

TMT Steel Bars are essential for reinforced concrete construction:

  • Building Foundations: Deep foundations, pile caps, and raft foundations.
  • Columns & Beams: Load-bearing vertical and horizontal structural members.
  • Slabs & Roofs: Floor slabs, roof slabs, and suspended concrete platforms.
  • Seismic Zones: Structures in earthquake-prone areas requiring ductile reinforcement.
  • Infrastructure Projects: Bridges, flyovers, metro stations, and industrial structures.

name: Red Clay Bricks - Class A
description:
Red Clay Bricks - Class A Grade

Product Name: First Class Red Clay Building Bricks

Manufacturer: Local Brick Kiln / Regional Manufacturers

Brick Type: Wire-cut or molded clay bricks

Dimensions: 230mm x 110mm x 70mm (standard modular)

Standards: IS 1077:1992 specifications for common burnt clay bricks

Positioning: Premium quality bricks for load-bearing masonry construction

Key Features

  • High Compressive Strength: Class A grade offers 10+ MPa strength for structural applications.
  • Uniform Dimensions: Precise sizing ensures minimal mortar consumption and better construction.
  • Low Water Absorption: Less than 15% water absorption prevents dampness and efflorescence.
  • Sharp Edges: Well-defined corners and edges enable neat masonry work.
  • Natural Thermal Insulation: Clay properties provide excellent temperature regulation.

Benefits

  • Load-Bearing Capacity: Suitable for multi-story construction and structural walls.
  • Durability: Weather-resistant and long-lasting with minimal maintenance.
  • Fire Resistance: Non-combustible material provides excellent fire protection.
  • Sound Insulation: Dense structure offers good acoustic properties.
  • Eco-Friendly: Natural clay material is sustainable and recyclable.

Applications

Red Clay Bricks are versatile for various construction needs:

  • Load-Bearing Walls: External and internal structural walls in residential buildings.
  • Boundary Walls: Compound walls and property demarcation structures.
  • Partition Walls: Room dividers and non-structural internal partitions.
  • Paving & Flooring: Decorative outdoor paving and garden pathways.
  • Architectural Features: Exposed brick facades, arches, and decorative elements.

name: M-Sand (Manufactured Sand)
description:
M-Sand (Manufactured Sand)

Product Name: Crushed Stone Sand / Manufactured Sand

Manufacturer: Stone Crushing Plants

Material Type: Crushed granite/quarry dust processed sand

Packaging: Loose supply by truck or tractor

Standards: Conforms to IS 383:2016 for coarse and fine aggregates

Positioning: Eco-friendly alternative to river sand with superior quality

Key Features

  • Uniform Gradation: Controlled particle size distribution ensures consistent concrete quality.
  • Controlled Moisture: Lower moisture content compared to river sand reduces water requirement.
  • Angular Particles: Better interlocking provides superior bonding strength in concrete.
  • Free from Impurities: No silt, clay, or organic matter contamination.
  • Eco-Friendly: Sustainable alternative that doesn't deplete natural river sand resources.

Benefits

  • Better Concrete Strength: Angular shape and rough texture improve cement bonding.
  • Consistent Quality: Manufactured process ensures uniform quality across batches.
  • Reduced Shrinkage: Lower silt content minimizes concrete cracking and shrinkage.
  • Cost-Effective: Generally more affordable and readily available than river sand.
  • Sustainable Choice: Reduces environmental impact of river sand mining.

Applications

M-Sand is suitable for all construction applications:

  • Concrete Production: RCC structures, beams, columns, slabs, and foundations.
  • Masonry Mortar: Bricklaying and block work mortar preparation.
  • Plastering: Internal and external wall plastering and finishing.
  • Floor Screeding: Floor leveling and base preparation.
  • Block Manufacturing: Concrete block and paver block production.

name: Asian Paints Apex Ultima Exterior Emulsion
description:
Asian Paints Apex Ultima Exterior Emulsion

Product Name: Apex Ultima Protek - Premium Exterior Emulsion Paint

Manufacturer: Asian Paints Limited

Paint Type: 100% Acrylic Exterior Emulsion with weather protection

Packaging: 20 Liter, 10 Liter, 4 Liter, and 1 Liter packs

Coverage: Approximately 140-160 sq.ft per liter (2 coats)

Positioning: Premium exterior paint with 7-year warranty against flaking and peeling

Key Features

  • Advanced Rain Guard Technology: Forms protective shield against heavy monsoon rains.
  • Dirt Resistant Formula: Self-cleaning properties keep walls looking fresh longer.
  • UV Protection: Superior fade resistance maintains color vibrancy for years.
  • Crack Bridging: Flexible film bridges hairline cracks preventing water seepage.
  • Anti-Algae & Anti-Fungal: Prevents growth of algae and fungus on walls.

Benefits

  • Long-Lasting Protection: 7-year warranty ensures lasting beauty and protection.
  • Low Maintenance: Dirt-resistant properties reduce frequency of repainting.
  • Weather Durability: Excellent performance across all Indian climatic conditions.
  • Premium Finish: Smooth, luxurious matte finish enhances property aesthetics.
  • Cost Efficiency: Extended durability reduces long-term maintenance costs.

Applications

Apex Ultima is ideal for exterior surfaces:

  • Building Exteriors: Complete external wall painting for residential and commercial buildings.
  • Boundary Walls: Compound walls exposed to harsh weather conditions.
  • Balconies & Terraces: Semi-covered areas prone to rain and UV exposure.
  • Heritage Structures: Renovation and preservation of old buildings.
  • Coastal Areas: Properties near sea requiring extra weather protection.

name: 20mm Coarse Aggregates (Stone Chips)
description:
20mm Coarse Aggregates (Stone Chips)

Product Name: 20mm Crushed Stone Aggregates

Manufacturer: Stone Crushing Plants / Quarries

Aggregate Type: Angular crushed stone chips

Size: 20mm nominal size (passing through 20mm sieve)

Standards: Conforms to IS 383:2016 for coarse aggregates

Positioning: High-quality aggregates for structural concrete applications

Key Features

  • Uniform Gradation: Consistent particle size distribution for optimal concrete mix design.
  • Angular Shape: Crushed edges provide excellent interlocking and bonding.
  • High Crushing Strength: Superior compressive strength suitable for structural concrete.
  • Low Elongation Index: Well-proportioned particles ensure good workability.
  • Clean & Washed: Free from dust, silt, and organic impurities.

Benefits

  • Superior Concrete Strength: Angular shape and high strength contribute to robust concrete.
  • Better Workability: Proper gradation ensures easy mixing and placement.
  • Reduced Voids: Good packing density minimizes cement requirement.
  • Durability: Hard stone aggregates resist weathering and abrasion.
  • Versatile Application: Suitable for various concrete grades and applications.

Applications

20mm aggregates are essential for concrete production:

  • Structural Concrete: RCC beams, columns, slabs, and foundations.
  • Ready-Mix Concrete: Commercial RMC production for various grades.
  • Road Construction: Concrete pavement and road base layers.
  • Precast Elements: Concrete blocks, pipes, and prefabricated components.
  • Mass Concreting: Large concrete pours for dams and industrial floors.

name: Bosch GSB 550 RE Power Drill
description:
Bosch GSB 550 RE Power Drill

Product Name: Bosch GSB 550 RE Impact Drill Machine

Manufacturer: Bosch Power Tools

Tool Type: 13mm Corded Impact Drill with Variable Speed

Power Rating: 550W motor with 3000 RPM no-load speed

Warranty: 1 year manufacturer warranty

Positioning: Professional-grade power drill for heavy-duty construction applications

Key Features

  • Powerful 550W Motor: High torque output for drilling in concrete, wood, and metal.
  • Variable Speed Control: Electronic speed regulation from 0-3000 RPM for precise control.
  • Impact Function: Hammer drill mode delivers 48,000 BPM for concrete drilling.
  • 13mm Keyless Chuck: Quick bit changes without additional tools.
  • Ergonomic Design: Soft-grip handle reduces fatigue during extended use.

Benefits

  • Versatile Performance: Suitable for drilling wood, metal, plastic, and concrete.
  • Professional Quality: Bosch reliability ensures consistent performance on job sites.
  • User Comfort: Well-balanced design with vibration reduction for comfortable operation.
  • Time Efficiency: Quick bit changes and variable speed improve productivity.
  • Durable Construction: Robust housing withstands demanding construction environments.

Applications

Bosch GSB 550 RE is essential for various construction tasks:

  • Masonry Drilling: Installing fixtures, electrical boxes, and conduits in concrete walls.
  • Carpentry Work: Drilling holes in wood for furniture and structural framing.
  • Metal Fabrication: Creating holes in steel structures and metal sheets.
  • Home Improvement: DIY projects, renovations, and repair work.
  • Professional Construction: Commercial and residential building projects.

name: CPVC Pipes - Ashirvad
description:
Ashirvad CPVC Pipes for Hot & Cold Water

Product Name: Ashirvad Pro CPVC Plumbing Pipes

Manufacturer: Ashirvad Pipes (Aliaxis Group)

Pipe Type: Chlorinated Polyvinyl Chloride (CPVC) pressure pipes

Pressure Rating: SDR 11 (PN 15) for hot and cold water systems

Standards: Conforms to ASTM D2846 and IS 15778 standards

Positioning: Premium plumbing solution with lifetime warranty

Key Features

  • Hot Water Resistant: Withstands temperatures up to 93Â°C without degradation.
  • Corrosion Proof: Non-metallic composition eliminates rust and scale formation.
  • Chemical Resistant: Unaffected by acids, alkalis, and aggressive water.
  • Easy Installation: Solvent welding technique enables quick, leak-proof joints.
  • Long Service Life: Expected lifespan of 50+ years with proper installation.

Benefits

  • Safe for Drinking Water: Non-toxic material ensures water quality and taste.
  • Energy Efficient: Low thermal conductivity reduces heat loss in hot water lines.
  • Maintenance Free: No painting, rusting, or periodic replacement required.
  • Cost Effective: Lower installation and lifecycle costs compared to metal pipes.
  • Smooth Interior: Prevents bacterial growth and maintains consistent flow rates.

Applications

Ashirvad CPVC pipes are ideal for comprehensive plumbing:

  • Hot Water Supply: Solar heaters, geysers, and centralized hot water systems.
  • Cold Water Distribution: Domestic and commercial potable water supply.
  • Building Plumbing: Internal plumbing for residential and commercial buildings.
  • Industrial Applications: Chemical plants, food processing, and pharmaceutical facilities.
  • Fire Sprinkler Systems: Residential fire protection installations.

Sintex Pure Antimicrobial Water Tank

Dr. Fixit 301 Pidicrete URP

Greenply Green Club Plywood

Parryware Western Toilet (EWC)

Philips 9W LED Bulb (B22)
